issue.message: Field requires API level 29 (current min is 23): `android.media.MediaRecorder.OutputFormat#OGG`
Field requires API level 29 (current min is 23): `android.media.MediaRecorder.AudioEncoder#OPUS`
Call requires API level 33 (current min is 23): `launchChangeAppLanguageIntent`
Attribute `appCategory` is only used in API level 26 and higher (current min is 23)
Attribute `localeConfig` is only used in API level 33 and higher (current min is 23)
The application should not provide its own launch screen
A newer version of org.jetbrains.kotlin.android than 1.9.21 is available: 1.9.25
A newer version of com.google.devtools.ksp than 1.9.21-1.0.16 is available: 1.9.25-1.0.20
A newer version of com.android.application than 8.2.2 is available: 8.6.1
Expecting `android:screenOrientation="unspecified"` or `"fullSensor"` for this activity so the user can use the application in any orientation and provide a great experience on Chrome OS devices
Use `AppCompatResources.getDrawable()`
For locale "lt" (Lithuanian) the following quantity should also be defined: `many` (e.g. "1.1 obuolio")
For locale "cs" (Czech) the following quantity should also be defined: `many` (e.g. "10.0 dne")
For locale "pt" (Portuguese) the following quantity should also be defined: `many`
For locale "sk" (Slovak) the following quantity should also be defined: `many` (e.g. "10.0 dÅˆa")
